<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete manufacturer"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/{ManufacturerId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently deletes a manufacturer from the system. This operation will fail if the manufacturer has associated asset models.

**Prerequisites**
- **ManufacturerId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers](/docs/api/manufacturers/get-manufacturers) to find the manufacturer. Extract `Items[].ManufacturerId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List manufacturers: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers](/docs/api/manufacturers/get-manufacturers) â†’ identify target
2. Verify no models exist: Check that manufacturer has no associated models
3. Delete: [DELETE /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/\{ManufacturerId\}](/docs/api/manufacturers/delete-manufacturer)

**Deletion Constraints**
- Cannot delete manufacturers with existing asset models - delete or reassign models first
- Cannot delete manufacturers referenced by existing assets
- For bulk deletion, use [POST /api/v1.0/manufacturers/bulk/delete](/docs/api/manufacturers/bulk-delete-manufacturers)

**Error Responses**
- `404` - Manufacturer not found
- `409` - Manufacturer is in use and cannot be deleted

**Alternative: Site Removal**
To remove a manufacturer from a site without deleting it globally, use [DELETE /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/\{ManufacturerId\}/site](/docs/api/manufacturers/remove-manufacturer-from-site) instead.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/manufacturers/bulk/delete](/docs/api/manufacturers/bulk-delete-manufacturers) - Delete multiple manufacturers
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/\{ManufacturerId\}/site](/docs/api/manufacturers/remove-manufacturer-from-site) - Remove from site only

  title={"Body"}
